channel.title: Npc stats
channel.description: SO say I'm adding a npc for example.. Primal Warriors, and Primal warriors are in the server but they don't hit you, they just hit constant zeros, but I want them to crank like 60s per say how would I do this ? I cant figure out how to change npc stats any where

item.title: Npc stats
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Yeah right after I posted this I figured it out, didn’t think to remove sorry Xd

Read full topic

item.title: Npc stats
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

On a standard PI server, it’s in your spawn-config.cfg or whatever it’s named.

It’s something like
npcid = ID-X-Y-Z-Walk-Max-Att-Def
The dashes being tabs.
The var names being numbers.

Read full topic
